Message.Title: FORD stock is at a key area Now
Message.Msg: It could very well go higher, but I have sold off some of my position. NO, I'm not shorting. Only a fool would right now. But from low 9s to 10.30s I have made a nice profit. The chart pattern is very near a typical completion for a cup & handle. That does not mean we won't go higher. Not long ago I said look for 10.35 - 10.50..... We'll we are here. I like keeping my profits. I still have a chunk in Ford though. I also invested in FTK in the 11.60 area. For the same reasons. Cup & Handle chart pattern along with volume change and moving averages lining up sweetly. Within three weeks FTK went from 11.40 to 12.98. FTK will head towards 14.70 to complete the cup & handle and then I will sell off some to. Those profits will go back into F most likely. I would post more TA, unfortunately I get mocked for it (yet it really works, what do you think the computers use?? Emotions? News? Lol) and my posts disappear. I've posted some TA facts and only F info and my posts neither show up or just dissapear. I hope F investors are doing well. :) PS, nothing wrong with buying Ford at these numbers for a long investment. F will only go up with simple retraces.

Message.Title: DON'T FIGHT THE FED -- More
Message.Msg: The nation's top economists have repeated said that the economy will truly recover only when the real-estate sector does. Well, NOW that the FED announced its CONTINUOUS QE, whereby it will buy $40 BILLION in mortgage-backed securities EVERY MONTH, banking and real-estate stocks have begun to take off. As a result, the US stock markets have begun their long overdue ascend, which will inevitably improve the ECONOMY. SO DON'T FIGHT THE FED.

Message.Title: Price should go up
Message.Msg: I think that folks that just jumped in the 14 and low 15 range to get a quick gain are now almost finished selling off their trading shares. I expect Yahoo! to move up sharply next week with the payout of funds from Alibaba. I hope that they make constructive use of funds. IMO that includes buying back shares, and strategic acquisitions. What many have missed is that MM really is in touch with the new technology ideas that are emerging in the industry. She has done well with her own personal investments in startup companies and there is reason to believe she will make good decisions with pending investments. I would rather invest the proceeds in new companies than get a one time payment. That being said, I still wonder why take cash and pay a huge chunk in taxes if you are going to turn around and buy startup companies. Why not have the money routed through the new companies and defer the taxes to some point in the future when those assets are producing some solid capital returns?????

Message.Title: Close around 16 today?
Message.Msg: I am thinking YHOO will move up close to 16 by the close in anticipation of clarification of timing of Alibaba cash and maybe even use of that cash at some point over the weekend. No, no blockbuster news, maybe a press release confirming some of the rumors on the Alibaba closing. That news alone will move YHOO up to over 16.5 on Monday. So I am guessing shorts are covering and longs are holding or buying more stock and overall the price today goes close to 16.

Message.Msg: Yahoo needs to appoint volunteer monitors for these boards who will have the immediate authority to delete all of the following posts and threads: -political comments not related to the company at hand. -serial message board scams. -nonsense posts. -stock promotions of other companies. Message.Title: Swing Trading Long Yahoo Inc.
Message.Msg: Good Afternoon: Yahoo Inc. is doing a great week. Tech. speaking reversal is taking place from support level, with two nice weekly candles with big green bodies. MM 200 sessions usually is the frontier from Bulls and Bears, and YHOO break up this MM, so it seems to me that Bulls are on charge again in drivers seat. MM 20 on daily graphs are turning up wild so crossing MM20 /50 & 200 will creat a nice Upward Momentum for Longs. Company news next week could confirm this Swing up. Volume is accumulative on OBV oscilator and Chaikin money flow is up, a signal that fresh money is coming YHOO. Stay Long and you´ll be rewarded for sure. Have a nice week-end

Message.Title: Tired of waiting for Internet explorer and yahoo to load?
Message.Msg: Are you sick and tired of Yahoo controlling your content, slowing down your pages and generally being s-l-o-o-o-o-o-w? What I did was to download Mozilla Firefox. It's 10 times faster than Yahoo and Internet Explorer and they don't continually mess around in your business. It features 'on the spot' spell check and many other emenities, all better than Yahoo and Internet explorer. AND, THEY DON'T INSIST THAT YOU SIGN UP FOR FACEBOOK, the people known for selling your content. Wise up and dump Yahoo and Internet explorer. You'll be glad you did. Chances of Yahoo surviving the next year are dim at best.
